traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The storm crow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: magic missile 1/day: haste

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the malphas has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Night Terror (1/round)
traits.desc: As a bonus action immediately after making a successful melee attack, a malphas storm crow can cast magic missile through his or her sword at the same target.

traits.name: Swordtrained
traits.desc: Malphas are trained from youth in combat. They are proficient with all martial melee and ranged weapons.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The malphas makes three longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Call
actions.desc: A malphas can cast magic missile as a reaction when it is hit by a ranged weapon attack.
